Description: Mould-made pottery `Frog Type' lamp decorated on top with palm-leaves and a disintegrated bear. The nozzle is damaged. There is a faint base-ring.
Bibliographic references: Lamp / Catalogue of the Lamps in the British Museum (Q2151)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir John Tomlinson Brunner
Donated by: Sir Henry Hoyle Howorth
